scripts.build: npm run icons-build && sass --load-path=node_modules --no-source-map --style compressed uitoolkit.scss:dist/css/uitoolkit.css uitoolkit-tempo-support.scss:dist/css/uitoolkit-tempo-support.css
scripts.icons-storybook: icon-font-generator src/icons/svg/*.svg -o src/assets/fonts/ --csspath src/icons/_tk-icons-embedded.scss -p tk-icon -n tk-icons -j false --csstp src/assets/fonts/tk-icons.hbs && node src/scripts/icons-storybook
scripts.icons-build: icon-font-generator src/icons/svg/*.svg -o dist/fonts/ --csspath src/icons/_tk-icons-embedded.scss -p tk-icon -n tk-icons -j false --html false
